product.title: μCT 50 Cabinet microCT Scanner
product.summary: The μCT50/100/100HE series from SCANCO Medical AG combines the largest sample chamber with ultra-high resolution down to 0.5/1.25/1.5 μm. A 12-position auto-sampler supports batch and unattended operation. Typical use covers ex vivo specimens (bone, teeth, tissue, materials) and various materials for internal structural and mechanical analysis. With contrast enhancement, it enables fine imaging of cardiovascular, urinary and digestive systems in animals. Widely used in orthopedics, dentistry, oncology, regenerative medicine, cardiovascular studies, materials science, geology and paleontology.

type.label: Type
lines: Fully shielded, no external shielding required

xray_source.label: X-ray Source
xray_source.value: Sealed, air-cooled, maintenance-free; 5–30 µm focal spot (4–18 W); 20–100 kVp (preset/calibrated 45/55/70/90 kVp)

resolution.label: Resolution
resolution.value: < 2 µm (10% MTF); 0.5–100 µm nominal isotropic voxel size (incl. nanoCT 0.5 µm)

options.label: Auto-sampler
options.value: Up to 12 sample positions (depending on max sample size)
